review: Got one of these during the $20 deal.  I have a chromecast and an older roku.  Mainly got it for Twitch.tv and the Prime movies.  Unfortunately, this is the laggiest of the 3 devices.  I can run chromecast off my phone and laptop to the TV just fine.  The roku runs everything I need just fine off of it.  The Fire TV stick LAGS for everything.  It constantly buffers and downgrades the video quality.  I don't know what the issue is, but all 3 devices are in the same place and my home wifi works for everything else just fine.Maybe amazon cheaped out on the range or wifi ability or something...but either way, it has become a $20 piece of garbage.
